references.paper_title: An ℓp theory of pca and spectral clustering
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for the ℓp-norm based PCA, which is a key concept related to sparse PCA.

references.paper_title: High-dimensional analysis of semidefinite relaxations for sparse principal components
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in establishing the theoretical foundations of semidefinite programming relaxations for sparse PCA.

references.paper_title: First efficient convergence for streaming k-pca: a global, gap-free, and near-optimal rate
references.reason: This work provides the first efficient convergence result for streaming k-PCA, a problem closely related to the streaming sparse PCA problem addressed in the target paper.
